attributes.action: Establish an immediate Board of Enquiry into why the naval personnel who became hostages in Iran were exposed to such action without proper support from air and sea, including whether such exposure resulted from Government cost-cutting in the armed forces.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 15 young naval personnel were taken hostage by Iran whilst undertaking a duty which exposed them to such possibility without any air or naval cover. It is reported that the reason the covering helicopter returned to H.M.S. Cornwall and did not stay to cover them was due to the need to save fuel cost.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
